# Instructions
- download one data set from [data.gov](https://www.data.gov/) as a .csv
- load it into R and find something interesting
- communicate your results in R Markdown
    - write 1 paragraph describing the data set and what you found
    - make one plot
    - find one statistics ()

# Deliverables
Hand in the .Rmd and .HTML documents and the data set (as a .csv file). Name the file *first*_*last_a1.RMD (i.e. iain_carmichael_a1.csv)

# Hints
save the data set in the same folder as the .Rmd file
